event.title: Richard Stallman gives a talk about "The Free Software Movement and the GNU/Linux Operating System" in Leicester, UK

body.p: On June 23, Richard Stallman gives a talk about "The Free Software Movement and the GNU/Linux Operating System" at De Montfort University, Leicester. The event will take place at the Hawthorn Building of De Montfort University, Leicester LE1 9BH from 13.30 to 15.30.
